item.description:
RSVP's are open on the 40+ Progressive Singles meetup site  

Hi everyone:  Recently, I began a series of singles progressive dinner mixers. They've been very successful and there has been requests to offer this dinner event to Singles 50+.    So, I am excited to announce that our first progressive dinner will be held at the oceanfront restaurant, Antonia's Cucina Italiana. We have a private room with views of the Atlantic Ocean. Welcome fans of THE AL VEGA TRIO.  Al will join us for a short talk and also extend a special invitation to join him in the lounge following our dinner.

The cocktail hour begins at 7p - conversation starters and other facilitated activities make this event special.  The first course of plated rollotini will be served around 8p.  At each different course, the gents will change tables.  That gives everyone a chance to dine with 15 other people throughout the evening.  The menu continues with: 

Fresh Green Garden Salad
 Chicken Florentine with Spinach

Dessert includes coffee, tea mini cannoli's and tiramisu.

Fixed Price includes tax and gratuities - $44.00

Live music by Al Vega starts at 8p in the lounge.  

Cocktail service available throughout the evening. 

 Kindly let us know if you have food allergies or restrictions. The $44 cost for the dinner includes all taxes and gratuity. Reservations are accepted on a first come first serve basis and will be guaranteed with your $10 paypal. The $34.00 balance will be collected at the door. We will limit this dinner to forty - 20 men/20 women, and it will be held regardless of gender parity.  This singles dinner is being advertised  beyond this meetup site. Refunds will be offered in the event of cancellation.
item.why: OPEN SPOTS - Check out the 40+ Progressive Singles meetup site

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Singles Dinner Mixer - SPOTS OPEN 40+ Progressive meetup
